unnormalised: Flash sales, right? They're like a mad dash at Linking Road, *every* Sunday! Got that FOMO feeling hitting hard, no? I remember in '3 Idiots', Rancho saying "Chase excellence, success will follow". But here, you gotta chase the discount *fast*! Think I'll grab that saree from Banarasi House if it's cheap enough. Gotta be quicker than Raj from DDLJ though! Sale ends at 6 PM sharp! Wish me luck!
